AllItems.Name: Bid Card
AllItems.Description: Accept and become a member! Revives from DA status with 200 health.

AllItems.Name: Black Book
AllItems.Description: Signed by Professor Cheema! Buffs TCFP.

AllItems.Name: Car Keys
AllItems.Description: "Someone HAS to have them" - Palmer fiending for McD's. Enables Delt to use Drive on Map.

AllItems.Name: Cheesy Greens
AllItems.Description: A gooey web blanket of mozzerela atop fresh broccoli from a can. Repels Delts for 50 steps.

AllItems.Name: Chicken Fried Steak
AllItems.Description: Meathook exacts her final act of vengence. Repels Delts for 150 steps.

AllItems.Name: Chocolate Milk
AllItems.Description: Belz tested, parent approved.

AllItems.Name: Composite
AllItems.Description: Various paddle names and scribbles appear on the back of this composite, including one "Shuckinator, 1169"

AllItems.Name: Daddy's Check
AllItems.Description: The memo says, "Give your mom a call <3, Dad". Cures Indebted.

AllItems.Name: Dead Fidel
AllItems.Description: He was so young... Heals 10/turn.

AllItems.Name: Delta Sig Badge
AllItems.Description: "To encourage scholarship, social activity and the association of students for their mutual advancement by research and practice"

AllItems.Name: Deltialyte
AllItems.Description: Enough electrolytes to hydrate the Mojave desert. Cures intoxication.

AllItems.Name: DormKicks
AllItems.Description: I better get a pair for this, Houston.

AllItems.Name: Dough Co
AllItems.Description: Fried bliss! Heals 100, cures intoxication.

AllItems.Name: Dutch
AllItems.Description: This'll pep you right up. Cures high.

AllItems.Name: Exec BidBall
AllItems.Description: Somebody call this kid and get him down here! Ball Strength 5.

AllItems.Name: Frat God BidBall
AllItems.Description: Bruh, he's here on a football scholarship with a 4 point. Ball Strength 6.

AllItems.Name: Geed BidBall
AllItems.Description: Softball bid. Ball Strength 1.

AllItems.Name: Hammer
AllItems.Description: Get hammering or get hammered.

AllItems.Name: Hawaiian Time
AllItems.Description: Sweet teryaki chicken and rice for days. Heals 200.

AllItems.Name: Humility
AllItems.Description: A little goes a long way. Cures Suspension.

AllItems.Name: Ice
AllItems.Description: For that burn. Cured Roasted.

AllItems.Name: McPalmers
AllItems.Description: "But you can get so much for so little!" Heals 50.

AllItems.Name: Megaphone
AllItems.Description: "AAAADDDDDDDDDDDDIIIIIIIIS!!!!" Cures Sleep.

AllItems.Name: Member BidBall. Ball Strength 4.
AllItems.Description: Solid guy, throw him a bid.

AllItems.Name: Neophyte BidBall
AllItems.Description: Some of the guys claim to like him... Ball Strength 3.

AllItems.Name: Oil Beef
AllItems.Description: Would you like some meat with that canola oil? Repels Delts for 250 steps.

AllItems.Name: Onyx Ring
AllItems.Description: Engraved on the ring: "Through marriage we transform"

AllItems.Name: Papa Souls
AllItems.Description: BBQ goodness sent from above. Heals 250, cures all statuses (including DA).

AllItems.Name: Pedialyte
AllItems.Description: Enough electrolytes to hydrate the Mojave desert. Cures Intoxication.

AllItems.Name: Peppermint Shnapps
AllItems.Description: A holiday favorite. Buffs Courage.

AllItems.Name: Pledge BidBall
AllItems.Description: He'd be lucky to have us. Ball Strength 2.

AllItems.Name: Sig Chi Badge
AllItems.Description: Inscribed on the back are the words "Friendship, Justice and Learning"

AllItems.Name: Sig Nu Badge
AllItems.Description: Inscribed on the back are the words "Love, Honor, Truth"

AllItems.Name: Slippery Butts
AllItems.Description: Still waiting on the sequel. Buffs ChillToPull.

AllItems.Name: Soap
AllItems.Description: Seems like these are always on the brink of running out. Cures Plague.

AllItems.Name: Ticket
AllItems.Description: The solution to FOMO.

AllItems.Name: Water Balloon
AllItems.Description: Squishy! Buffs Truth.

AllItems.Name: Wrench
AllItems.Description: How handy!
